oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A Solution Toward the OFF-State Degradation in Drain-Extended MOS Device
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SHRIVASTAVA, M
JAIN, R
BAGHINI, MS
GOSSNER, H
RAO, VR
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: band-to-band tunnelling (btbt)
drain extended
drain-extended mos (demos)
input/output
time-dependent dielectric breakdown (tddb)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We investigated the surface band-to-band tunnelling (BTBT) current under the OFF-state condition in drain-extended MOS (DeMOS) devices. We found significant gate-induced drain leakage current due to surface BTBT, which was also reported earlier as the dominant cause of early time-dependent dielectric breakdown and device failure. Furthermore, a layout solution for the existing DeMOS device is proposed in order to mitigate the surface BTBT current and the associated gate oxide reliability issues, without sacrificing the mixed-signal performance of the device.
